response.original_title: 実録!!ほんとにあった恐怖の投稿映像 ～輪廻の恐怖～
response.overview: The series has been collabolated with various genres such as TV personalities, magazines, and news sites, and has over 80 titles in total! This time, the video contains a phenomenon that can be described as the fear of a grudge that repeats itself forever. Many people testify to the same sightings. In other words, it is a figure of a vengeful spirit that continues to bind and stay in that place. The otherworldly beings vividly recorded in this video may be wandering forever in samsara.
response.title: Actual Record! Real Horror Posted Video: Fear of Reincarnation
